text: What type of product development is being requested? (New Development / Modify Existing / Formulate to Benchmark / Line Extension / PDR Revision / Formula Redirect / Tech Transfer)
What is the name of the company or brand?
Who is the contact person?
What is the contact's phone number?
What is the contact's email?
What is the product name?
Has the final product name been confirmed? (Yes/No)
Will the product be filled as a cosmetic? (Yes/No + Instructions)
What is the intended launch channel? (DTC / Retail)
What is the estimated launch date?
What is the estimated launch quantity?
What is the estimated annual reorder quantity?
What is the target cost per unit?
What is the desired fill size?
What is the reference package and type?
What is the packaging material, color, and finish?
What label type is needed? (Front/Back / Wraparound / Top / Bottom / None)
What type of closure is required? (Pump / Airless Pump / Foamer / Cap / Induction Seal / Other)
Is a unit carton required? (Yes/No + Material/Color/Finish)
Is shrink wrap needed for primary packaging? (Yes/No)
What kind of seal will be used for the unit carton? (Shrink Wrap / Tamper Seal)
Should the unit carton include a lot code? (Yes/No)
What is the case count and pallet count?
What are the packout instructions? (Unit Carton, Inner Tamper Seal, Kit Status, Extra Costs, Outer Markings)
Are there any other components or renderings provided? (Kit Description)
Should the project be turnkey? (Yes/No)
Is a Bill of Materials available? (If Applicable)
Will Product Society handle 3PL logistics? (Yes/No)
What type of formulation is being requested? (Cosmetic / OTC-Drug)
What are the active ingredients, if any? (List of Ingredients)
What efficacy or performance claims are being made? (Claims)
What marketing claims apply to the product? (Organic / Paraben-Free / Vegan / etc.)
What is the brand or ingredient story? (Narrative)
What is the application area for the product? (Face / Hair / Body / Other)
What is the desired fragrance level and color? (Fragrance Level / Color / Appearance)
Are there required or restricted ingredients? (Required / Blacklist / Tech Transfer allowed?)
What is the benchmark product? (Benchmark Name)
What is its MSRP? (Benchmark MSRP)
What are the favorable and negative attributes of the benchmark? (Favorable / Negative)
If a formula is provided for validation, what must be submitted? (Bench Sample, Specs, Micro, Stability, Match parameters)
In which markets will the product be distributed? (US / Canada / Mexico / Europe / etc.)
Where should product samples be sent? (Address)
What FedEx or UPS account number should be used? (Account Number)
Are there any additional comments or requirements? (Free-form entry)
